description: Crashes computer, don't install. Very very slow, crashes computer
i first installed it and it was running good. now next month i rediscovered it and it won't even open!

However, if you are using Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS on Raspberry Pi 4 (arm64, unofficial; modified by James A. Chambers at jamesachambers.com), then it will not work. I suspect that Mr. Chambers might have overlooked this package in his converting of packages to ARM. If Mr. Chambers is reading this, could you please built it properly for ARM? Thank you to Mr. Chambers, and otherwise, it works wonderfully!
summary: Best fighter plane simulator in repositories!

description: The frame rate is unacceptably slow. I have a decently fast computer and the graphics are very simple, but the game frequently freezes even in the menu.
The graphics are jerky. No instructions on how to maneuver the aircraft.

description: For what it is, a free flight sim that works natively on Linux, not too shabby. It's not very advanced in terms of graphics, but joystick integration (3D extreme) worked well after a little bit of remapping in options.
3d and add some other planes and fighter jets
i dont trust it
I would highly recommend it. Great simulator. Just wish there were more games like this.
You have to adjust the settings to make it a game worth playing, but after that, it was great!
It changed the setup of my screen and had to work a lot to go back to normal!

summary: Cool game but could be better.....

description: changes clock rate to monitor to one that is out of range for my monitors

As of the time of my reviewing this, the game works and is playable. It still has the occasional crash if settings are missconfigured, and the menu (but not the game) is extremely laggy no matter what you do, but none of these issues are game breaking. Other than that, this game is a solid, if not particularly graphicaly impressive, combat flight sim. Well worth the disk space.

Used to be a great game, just upgraded to an i7 17 Lenovo 16gb ram nVidia GTX. Top of the line Laptop running 20.04.
